text: - My name is Parneet,
and I've been at AWS for four months now.

I work with the data
lifecycle management team.
(upbeat music)

So actually I got hired to AWS
through university program,
because of the scale at which AWS works.
I wanted to learn
and to be able to work at that scale
and to have that impact in sort of way

over the AWS has, I wanted
to become a part of that.
(upbeat music)

To everyone out there who's
trying to come into AWS
or who is in the university,

which is like me last year,
I would say go for it.

I mean, AWS is somewhere you'll
be able to get a trajectory
towards what you want your career to be.

You not only learn here,
you'll get amazing mentors.
You'll get amazing guidance,

and then you can go
anywhere you want from here.
(upbeat music)
Obviously, AWS is a dream come true

for I would say any software
developer out there,

and especially who's
one in the university.

I get to work with these
amazing people around me,

with this amazing talent,
that's been all over the world,

and I can learn something
new every single day.
(upbeat music)
